Pretty well, thanks! Just finished restoring this old Jeep Grand Cherokee. It was a big project.
It was a lot of work, but I love how it turned out. Got me thinking though, it’s a gas guzzler.
It’s beautiful! But yeah, we should all try to be mindful of our impact on the environment with our choices.
Right? It’s difficult though. I mean,  you need a car sometimes, and electric cars are so expensive.
For sure. There are definitely policies that could help make eco-friendly options more accessible though, don't you think? Maybe subsidies for electric cars, or better public transportation?
Absolutely. I think government incentives could make a huge difference.  I know some people think it's all about individual choices, but systemic changes are really what's needed.
I agree. It's a complex issue, but something we really need to address.
